title: Perfect Dark (Emulator with Keyboard and Mouse) playthrough -- Part 3
description: There were some annoying glitches happening in the alien ship mission, so that sucked. Also the game is getting hard as fuck at the end, which is cool but also frustrating. I welcome the difficulty though, it's pretty wonderful actually. Not too annoying. Going to beat this game next part and then start Goldeneye.
